title: Foxworth Friday: Josh Allen vs. Lamar Jackson, Ime Udoka's Suspension, Tom Brady's Struggles
description:
Bomani Jones and Domonique Foxworth talk QB play across the league, including the Ravens and Bills matchup that promises to “tear America apart” (3:27). Plus, the Buccaneers' struggling offense (20:34), and coach Ime Udoka’s suspension for the year with the Celtics as well as the media narrative around it (31:43).
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
